page.title: 19MARYC.SUPERNATURAL LADY
page.content: Sir Godfrey Wedderburn was a Knight Templar who fought in the Holy Land. Badly wounded, he was devotedly nursed back to health by a Saracen lady. She loved him but because of his vows he could not marry her. She gave him a ring with a small, bright stone, said to protect him from danger. When he returned to Maryculter she followed him. When she was discovered the Preceptor did not believe Godfrey had kept his vow. He was ordered to kill himself and plunged a dagger into his breast. The Saracen maid dared the Preceptor to wear the charm as a witness to Godfrey's innocence. As he did so a blinding flash and a bolt of fire struck the earth and he vanished. The crater is known today as the Thunderhole. The lady killed herself. Dressed in green, she roams the countryside.
